alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orange Heights to near Bostwick. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Melrose, Hawthorne, Florahome, Melrose Landing, Bardin, Hollister, Cross Creek and Johnson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
